ast.name: colors library
ast.comment:
A few useful scripts to work with colors and pictures. Alpha supported!


•gradient: creates a smooth gradient picture
•tint: tints an image with the selected color and value
•chroma key: replaces the selected color range with another color
•color to number: decodes a color to a number
• number to color: encodes the color from a number
•invert color: returns the inverted/negative color
